column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////After a less than satisfactory experience at the Medical Center store
column2: I decided to give Common Bond another chance. About 3 weeks ago
column3: I visited the Montrose location. My breakfast was very good; however
column4: I was taken aback by having to stare at the "F" word written on the men's room wall above the urinal. I reported this to the manager
column6: and she contacted the corporate office. Before I left
column7: she came by my table and said it would be cleaned up that week.
